          <title>
            <string language="en">Dissolving or corroding a metal using a strong acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Metall mit einer starken Säure auflösen oder
korrodierend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dissolvant ou corrodant un métal en utilisant un 
acide fort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dissolvendo ou corroendo um metal usando um ácido
forte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissolvendo o corrodendo un metallo usando un 
acido forte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάλυση ή διάβρωση ενός μετάλλου που χρησιμοποιεί 
ένα ισχυρό οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Disolviendo o corroyendo un metal usando un ácido
fuerte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that a strong acid can dissolve or corrode a metal.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß eine starke

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre qu'un acide fort peut 
dissoudre ou corroder un métal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que um ácido forte pode 
dissolver ou corroer um metal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che un acido forte può

          </description>
          <description>
